title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout in build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of remaining, the second row is also removed.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, only the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should remain unchanged.
SR:
1. Run the attached test case. 
2. Drag the Script coolItem to the second row. 
3. Drag the Launch coolItem to the second row, placing it after the Script item. 
4. Drag the Search coolItem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolItem. 
5. Drag the Open Type coolItem to the second row, placing it after the Search coolItem. 
6. Press the Delete button. Verify that only the first item on the second row is deleted, and the second row remains unchanged.
